descriptionMdByRank.1: Increases [ATK](https://wutheringwaves.fandom.com/wiki/ATK) by **12%**. Casting Echo Skill within 10s after casting [Intro Skill](https://wutheringwaves.fandom.com/wiki/Intro_Skill) or [Basic Attacks](https://wutheringwaves.fandom.com/wiki/Basic_Attack) grants 1 stacks of Gentle Dream. Echoes with the same name can only trigger this effect once, stacking up to 2 times, lasting for 10s. When reaching 2 stacks, casting Echo Skill no longer resets the duration of this effect. This effect activates up to once per 10s. Switching to another Resonator ends this effect early. With 1 stack: Grants **40%** [Basic Attack](https://wutheringwaves.fandom.com/wiki/Basic_Attack) DMG Bonus. With 2 stack: Ignores **12%** of the target's [Havoc](https://wutheringwaves.fandom.com/wiki/Havoc) RES.
